verses.verse: וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach took שְׁמוּאֵ֜ל <WH8050> she-mu-'El Then Samuel אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פַּ֥ךְ <WH6378> pach a vial הַשֶּׁ֛מֶן <WH8081> hash-She-men of oil וַיִּצֹ֥ק <WH3332> vai-yi-Tzok and poured עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over רֹאשׁ֖וֹ <WH7218> ro-Sho [it] upon his head וַיִּשָּׁקֵ֑הוּ <WH5401> vai-yish-sha-Ke-hu; and kissed וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer him and said הֲל֗וֹא <WH3808> ha-Lo, not כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for מְשָׁחֲךָ֧ <WH4886> me-sha-cha-Cha hath anointed יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh [Is it] not because the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over נַחֲלָת֖וֹ <WH5159> na-cha-la-To heritage לְנָגִֽיד׃ <WH5057> le-na-Gid. thee [to be] captain

וְחָלַפְתָּ֨ <WH2498> ve-cha-laf-Ta Then shalt thou go on מִשָּׁ֜ם <WH8033> mish-Sham there וָהָ֗לְאָה <WH1973> va-Hal-'ah, forward וּבָ֙אתָ֙ <WH935> u-Va-ta from thence and thou shalt come עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- far אֵל֣וֹן <WH436> e-Lon to the plain תָּב֔וֹר <WH8396> ta-Vor, of Tabor וּמְצָא֤וּךָ <WH4672> u-me-tza-'U-cha and there shall meet שָּׁם֙ <WH8033> sham and there שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> she-lo-Shah thee three אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH582> 'a-na-Shim, men עֹלִ֥ים <WH5927> 'o-Lim going up אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him to God בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵ֑ל <WH1008> 'El; to Bethel אֶחָ֞ד <WH259> 'e-Chad one נֹשֵׂ֣א׀ <WH5375> no-Se carrying שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> she-lo-Shah three גְדָיִ֗ים <WH1423> ge-da-Yim, kids וְאֶחָד֙ <WH259> ve-'e-Chad and another נֹשֵׂ֗א <WH5375> no-Se, carrying שְׁלֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH7969> she-Lo-shet three כִּכְּר֣וֹת <WH3603> kik-ke-Rot loaves לֶ֔חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem, of bread וְאֶחָ֥ד <WH259> ve-'e-Chad and another נֹשֵׂ֖א <WH5375> no-Se carrying נֵֽבֶל־ <WH5035> ne-vel- a bottle יָֽיִן׃ <WH3196> Ya-yin. of wine

וְצָלְחָ֤ה <WH6743> ve-tza-le-Chah will come עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-cha Then ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> Ru-ach And the Spirit יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD וְהִתְנַבִּ֖יתָ <WH5012> ve-hit-nab-Bi-ta upon thee and thou shalt prophesy עִמָּ֑ם <WH5973> 'im-Mam; them וְנֶהְפַּכְתָּ֖ <WH2015> ve-neh-pach-Ta with them and shalt be turned לְאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> le-'Ish man אַחֵֽר׃ <WH312> 'a-Cher. into another

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah, become כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki shall be when; תְבֹאֶינָה te-vo-'ei-nah כתָבֹ֛אנָה <WH935> ta-Vo-nah abide קהָאֹת֥וֹת <WH226> ha-'o-Tot And let it be when these signs הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh these לָ֑ךְ Lach; עֲשֵׂ֤ה <WH6213> 'a-Seh unto thee [that] thou do לְךָ֙ le-Cha אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher what תִּמְצָ֣א <WH4672> tim-Tza as occasion יָדֶ֔ךָ <WH3027> ya-De-cha, serve כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki shall be when הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him thee for God עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> 'im-Mach. and you
